Radiosondenaufstieg Tutorial
============================

This is a short description about how to use the program called Radiosondenaufstieg.

1. Import the required packages

2. Initialization of tephigram before definition of functions

3. Define the functions to plot the Tephigram:

* read_in
* plot_temp
* plot_dewpoint_temp
* plot_legend

4. Save the plot as png-File

5. Define the functions to plot the geographical map with Basemap, therefore create a Basemap instance

6. set properites, draw meridians

7. draw some data to the map (type coordinates)

8. transfrom coordinates for the projection

9. Plot Card and set correct marker with text

10. Execute all the previously defined functions
